backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the canvas size increase feature, listing affected files (SnakeCanvas.tsx, index.css), related components, and test ID REQ-20 with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the Snake game implementation including styling, game logic, canvas rendering, UI components, and utility functions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Impulse Snake application that mounts the React app to the root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the SnakeGamePage as the main application view.
frontend/src/components/ControlLegend.ts: React component displaying game controls (W/A/S/D for movement, Space to start) with keyboard icons and styled UI elements.
frontend/src/components/HudBar.tsx: Heads-up display component showing player name and current score with trophy icon, featuring fixed minimum height for stable layout.
frontend/src/game/SnakeCanvas.tsx: Responsive canvas renderer with 800px default size that uses ResizeObserver to dynamically calculate cell size and render the Snake game with high-DPI graphics support.
frontend/src/game/useImpulseSnake.ts: Custom React hook implementing Snake game logic with impulse-style controls, fixed self-collision detection allowing movement into vacating tail cells, and single-instance animation loop with proper cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP backend actor creation with authentication support, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook providing Internet Identity authentication with login/logout functionality, identity persistence, and configurable AuthClient options for ICP integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with a vibrant green/amber theme for the Snake game, including CSS custom properties for light/dark modes and utility classes for game grid background and responsive playfield sizing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/SnakeGamePage.tsx: Main game page component that manages game state, keyboard controls (WASD/arrows/space), player name input, and renders the start screen, HUD, canvas, and control legend with special handling to prevent game keys from interfering with text input fields.
Utility function that determines if a DOM element is a text-editing context (input, textarea, or contentEditable) to prevent game keyboard shortcuts from interfering with text entry.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, typography, container queries, animations, and plugins for the Snake game UI.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features, known issues (HUD positioning, player name input not accepting certain letters, missing final score on game-over), and architectural notes for the impulse-style Snake game.
